Plainfield City Council

The Plainfield City Council is the governing/legislative body of the City. Composed of seven elected officials, the primary purpose is to enact municipal laws via ordinances and resolutions.

Except for Executive Session, all meetings are open to the public.

2024 Plainfield City Council

Council President & Councilman-At-Large
Steve G. Hockaday (D)
317 Monroe Avenue
Cell: 908-872-0553
Email: Steve.hockaday@plainfieldnj.gov
Committees: Information Technology Committee (CHAIR), Economic Development Committee (CHAIR), Finance Committee, Senior Citizens Center Committee (ALT), Mayors Citizens Advisory Board 
Elected 11-03-20, General Election 4-Year Term Ending 12-31-2024



Council Vice President & Councilman First Ward
Robert Graham (D)
111 East Front Street
Cell: 908-560-2751
Email: Robert.Graham@plainfieldnj.gov
Committees: Public Safety Committee (CHAIR), Economic Development Committee, Recreation Committee, Special Improvement District (LIAISON), Information Technology Committee
Elected 11-08-22, General Election, 4-Year Term Ending 12-31-2026




Councilwoman-At-Large, First & Fourth Ward
